posts.title: Post2
posts.text: Scientists have developed catalysts that can convert carbon dioxide – the main cause of global warming – into plastics, fabrics, resins and other products. The discovery, based on the chemistry of artificial photosynthesis, is detailed in the journal Energy & Environmental Science.

posts.title: TestNumber-2
posts.text: This is my test post number two, made with purpose to test that my code is working well!
